about_the_game:
A versatile pack of 20 unique and original music tracks to cover various situations including battles, boss battles, towns, forests, ruins and more in RPG/JRPG and fantasy adventure games.

Features:

* 20 BGM tracks suitable for JRPG and Fantasy games!
* ogg, mp3, m4a and wav formats included
* For use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

Conquerer Of The Tide
Duel
Journeyman's Town
Miquanae Forest
Ranger's Assault
Ruins
The Grace of Wind
Timeless Ends
Turnpoint Grange
Volcanic Pass
A Battle Awaits
Adversus
Come And Get Me
Dimension Mismatch
Festival Dance
Forge Battle Part 1
Forge Battle Part 2
Golgago Swamp
Kaiju War
Scarrid Cave
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - JRPG and Fantasy Music Vol 1" and "RPG Maker MV - JRPG and Fantasy Music Vol 1" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

A versatile pack of 20 unique and original music tracks to cover various situations including battles, boss battles, towns, forests, ruins and more in RPG/JRPG and fantasy adventure games. Features: * 20 BGM tracks suitable for JRPG and Fantasy games! * ogg, mp3, m4a and wav formats included * For use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice!
